Cookies.Title: We use cookies

Download.p1: Thank you for choosing the LEVEL desktop version! Currently available for Windows and Linux, this version allows you to work on Bible translation projects offline. After installation, you'll have access to a test project within the program to explore its features.
Download.li1: Download the installation file by clicking the link below.
Download.li2: Run the file and follow the installation prompts.
Download.li3: Once installed, open the program to explore the test project and familiarize yourself with the platform.
Download.p2: We hope you enjoy using LEVEL! Stay tuned for updates and future releases for other operating systems.

LogoText.p1: Glokas is an AI-powered translation and localization platform specifically designed for Christian content and projects. Rapid, low-cost, efficient, and innovative.
LogoText.p2: At Glokas, our vision is to assist Christian ministries in spreading the Gospel of Jesus Christ through translation, localization tools, and services. We focus on all types of materials, and even small projects are equally important to us because even a small message of salvation can make a huge impact. That's why we are dedicated to creating an ecosystem that makes translation faster and more affordable without compromising quality.
LogoText.p3: Our slogan is 'One Gospel in different formats, to all languages, reaching billions of people.' We are not a translation agency but a platform that connects mission organizations with native translators, providing tools to make the translation process easy.
LogoText.p4: LEVEL's main goal is to help translate the Bible into all languages, using any translation methods and materials.
LogoText.p5: If you are interested in our tools and methods, please contact us.

EighthQuestion.Answer: We will soon be creating a page on the website with details on how you can support the development of the LEVEL platform. In the meantime, you can contact us via the customer support form.
EighthQuestion.Question: How can I support the development of the LEVEL platform?

FifthQuestion.Answer: We currently offer UnfoldingWord materials - https://www.unfoldingword.org/ We are also in the process of contacting other partners who provide materials for Bible translation work. If you are a representative of a project that is developing such materials, please contact us through the contact form.
FifthQuestion.Question: What partners provide materials for the platform?

FirstQuestion.Answer: The LEVEL platform is designed primarily for translating the Bible and biblical content. As a rule, such work is done by various missions and Bible societies. The LEVEL platform is also designed for local translation groups.
FirstQuestion.Question: Who is this platform for?

FourthQuestion.Answer: At the first phase, the LEVEL platform can only be used by participants of projects with which we have a preliminary cooperation agreement. If you plan to use the platform within a project, please contact us via the customer support form.
FourthQuestion.Question: How can I start using the LEVEL platform?

SecondQuestion.Answer: Use of the LEVEL platform is free for all users.
SecondQuestion.Question: What are the pricing for users of LEVEL?

SeventhQuestion.Answer: Yes, if you work with the online version of the platform. But if you work with the intranet version, there is no need for a permanent internet connection.
SeventhQuestion.Question: Is it necessary to have a stable Internet connection for working with the LEVEL platform?

SixthQuestion.Answer: If you represent a project and plan to using the LEVEL platform with your materials, please contact us via the customer support form.
SixthQuestion.Question: Can I upload my own materials?

ThirdQuestion.Answer: This button can only be used by registered users.
ThirdQuestion.Question: I click on the Login button, but I can't log in to the site. Why?

MainBlocks.HowItWorksText: Each translation process has its own order of operations. For example, in the first step, the translator reads the text (gets familiar with it). After that, he/she makes a draft of the translation. In the final step, the translator reads his text and makes changes (edits his translation). Realizing that each ethod of Bible translation has its own materials for each of these steps, we decided to create a platform where the translator could simply go to the project page and see only what he or she needs at that particular step. Depending on the method, the content of the tools varies.

FirstReview.Name: Ramis
FirstReview.Text: I have experience in Bible translation. We did the translation in different programs. But now I can say for sure that LEVEL is the best tool for teamwork in translation.

SecondReview.Name: Lina
SecondReview.Text: My impressions of working in LEVEL - It's not just convenient. It's comfortable.

ThirdReview.Name: Bakhrom
ThirdReview.Text: LEVEL is very much to my liking. It is very convenient that there is a command dictionary, and when you come across similar words, the dictionary helps you to use them in the same way in different places. It is very convenient that there is a biblical dictionary and there are explanations on how to better translate some difficult sentences. A very useful tool.

MainBlocks.LevelText:
LEVEL is a free-to-use, open-source platform for step-by-step Bible translation that can accommodate any type of text materials. Available in online, intranet, and offline versions, it is designed to support church-based translation projects and beyond, offering a reliable, customizable, and accessible solution for translators and teams.

If you're looking to start translating the Bible, work on Open Bible Stories, or need support with an existing project facing challenges, please don't hesitate to [contact us](/connect-with-us). We're here to help!

NotAllFieldFull: Not all fields are filled in!

Verse.text: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world for a testimony to all the nations, and then the end will come.
